content.question: ​The first term in a geometric sequence is <math alttext="g subscript 1 equals 5"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. For <math alttext="n greater or equal than 2"><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, the terms of the geometric sequence are given by <math alttext="g subscript n equals 3 times g subscript open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end subscript"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msub><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msub></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. For which of the following functions is <math alttext="g subscript n equals f open parentheses n close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>n</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for positive integer values of <math alttext="n"><semantics><mi>n</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 times 5 to the power of n"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mi>n</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3 times 5 to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5 times 3 to the power of n"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mi>n</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5 times 3 to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5 times 3 to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
